bit.name: Uses Simple Wind
bit.tooltip: the wind on this point won't have high-frequency variations

bit.name: Uses Damped Wind
bit.tooltip: the wind on this point will be artificially slow

bit.name: No Gravity
bit.tooltip: the point is not affected by gravity

float32.name: Surface Friction
float32.tooltip: when hitting the ground or interior, percentage of velocity lost in one collision

float32.name: Elasticity
float32.tooltip: 0.0 is inelastic collisions (no bounce) 1.0 is perfectly elastic (reflected velocity equals incoming velocity)

plugin.comment: air 0.0011 (g/mL) snow 0.128 cork 0.24 cedar 0.43 oak 0.866 ice 0.897 water 1.0 soil 1.1 cotton 1.491 dry earth 1.52 sand 1.7 granite 2.4 glass 2.5 iron 7.65 steel 7.77 lead 11.37 uranium 18.74 gold 19.3
